page.title: 08LOCAL AFFAIRS IN DUDLEY (2)
page.content: Other current topics include;the new {council offices }which will bring together several local councils under one roof. A new {bus station}is being built opposite C&A,on the site of the old bus stands.This is due to be completed by 1986 . Development suggestions for central Dudley include:new shopping areas for Stone street/Tower street,more specialist shops around a new civic square.Further improvements to the centre shopping area will include:landscaping,street furniture and pedestrianisation.Likely areas for this are Upper High street,Union street,Wolverhampton street and Stone street.
